resources.string: Your next class is %s! Would you like Concordia Mapsters to show you the way?
1. Finding your Location on the Map:
\t1.1. On the top right hand side of the screen, tap on the button containing a crosshair symbol.
\t2.1. On the top of the screen, tap the button that says either SGW or LOY.
\t2.2. Use these buttons to switch to the campus you would like to view.
\t3.1. Click on an outlined building on the map
\t3.2. The name of the building will appear in the red panel at the bottom of your screen.
\t3.3. Slide the red panel up to view information and services provided for that building.
\n4. Getting Directions to a Building from your Current Location:
\t 4.1. Slide-up the red panel located at the bottom of the screen.
\t4.2. Tap on the button containing an arrow located on the right-hand side of the screen.
\t4.3. Your directions will be illustrated on the map.
\t5.1. On the top-left hand side of the screen, tap on the 3 horizontal lines.
\t6.1. Access the options panel (Follow steps from 5.).
\t6.3. This will bring you to your Google calendar.
\t6.4. To get back to the Mapster app, tap on the back button on your device.
\n7. Viewing a List of Campus Buildings:
\t7.1. From Options Panel, tap on \'Campus Buildings\'.
\n8. Viewing a List of Campus Services:
\t8.1 From Options Panel, tap on \'Campus Services\'
\n9. Viewing a List of Campus Departments:
\t 9.1 From Options Panel, tap on \'Campus Departments\'
\t10.2. This will bring you to a list of different setting options.
The menu can be opened by touching this button, or swiping in from the edge.
You can see your course schedule, see concordia\'s offerings, change settings, and get help here.
Concordia buildings are highlighted, and you can get info about each by tapping on them.
Quickly switch views between Loyola and SGW campuses
Touch this to get your current Location
Rooms, services, buildings, and departments at your fingertips
Slide this panel up to find out more about the things you select
Take a peak inside concordia buildings from here
Get directions to Concordia buildings quickly
